mapper.insert: insert into p_board values( p_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0, #{mbo} )
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regDate, noReco, exReco, count from p_board_view
mapper.update: update p_board_view set count = count + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update p_board_view set noReco = noReco + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update p_board_view set exReco = exReco + 1 where bno = #{bno}
